data.title: Peter McArdle
data.meta_description: Infobox Artist name = Peter McArdle imagesize = 180 px caption = birthname = birthdate = 17 December 1965 location = Tynemouth deathdate = deathplace = nationality = English field = Painting training = University of Sunderland, Jeffrey Johnson…
data.text:
He described "On a Theme of Annunciation":

He was reviewed by Paul Clark in the "Evening Standard" as "a top draughtsman with a funky fluid style" and in "Art Review" as someone who "augurs well for the future of British painting". ["Evening Standard", 10 January 2001 and "Art Review" (undated), cited by Charles Thomson in "Daubs and Daubers" on [http://www.stuckism.com/Daubs.html stuckism.com] . Retrieved 19 March 2008.]
